pages.text: This is the start to your magical crafting. It takes 10 seconds per item to complete. This timer will reset for each item change, and will scale up with total items. (2 items will take 20 seconds, 4 will take 80, etc.)

Automation with just hoppers will be impossible, since the pedestal has a single inventory slot. However, if you use mods with item filtering, it should be pretty easy. (EnderIO, XNet, Thermal Dynamics, etc.)
